appetizers.name: Bhel Poori
appetizers.description: Rice puffs, tomatoes, onions, tamarind and mint chutneys mixed together with light spices. A perfect appetizer for summer

appetizers.name: Shrimp Manchurian
appetizers.description: Shrimps tossed in a sweet and sour sauce.

entrees.name: Nawabi Kofta
entrees.description: Potato and corn croquettes in a yogurt based curry sauce.

entrees.name: Murg Aur Subzi
entrees.description: Fresh vegetable, cooked with curry chicken cubes.

entrees.name: Kashmiri Lamb Curry
entrees.description: Lamb cubes cooked in a special cardamom infused curry made with onions, ginger, garlic, tomatoes, spices and a touch of milk.

entrees.name: Pineapple Shrimp Korma
entrees.description: Shrimps cooked in a cashew cream sauce, with diced pineapple cubes.
